dmca.title: Wedding Site Seeks Divorce from Copyist
dmca.body:
It has come to our attention through the use of copyscape.com that the website www.info4wedding.com/weddingdress_shoppingtips.htm is infringing on our copyright by publishing our article, Finding the Perfect Formal, Informal Wedding Dress or Designer Gown located at http://www.topweddingsites.com/wedding-dress.html. We have had this article available online since about October 2003 on this page www.topweddingsites.com/wedding_dress.html which now redirects to our new page listed above. We were not able to locate any contact information at the website. But the whois information is from China.

Domain Name..........info5wedding.com
Creation Date........ 2004-12-01
Registration Date.... 2004-12-01
Organisation Name....Domain Admin
Organisation Address. 48 Dongfeng Road W
Organisation Address. Guangzhou
Organisation Address.510060
Organisation Address. GD
Organisation Address. CHINA

Tech Name........... Web Master
Tech Address......... 48 Dongfeng Road W
Tech Address.........  Guangzhou
Tech Address......... 510060
Tech Address.........  GD CHINA
Tech Email.......... [Private]@info4wedding.com
Tech Phone........... 8499 3987
Tech Fax............ 8620
Name Server.......... ns1.cdnshost.com
Name Server.......... ns1.cdnshost.com

Sincerely,
[Private]
President, Top Wedding Sites, Inc.
[Private]@topweddingsites.com

Copyrighted text highlighted

Text from Our Site. We own the Copyright: http://www.topweddingsites.com/wedding-dress.html

Finding The Perfect Formal, Informal Wedding Dress or Designer Gowns


Finding The Perfect Formal, Informal Wedding Dress or Designer Gowns

Read the full page article

Research: Look through bridal magazines and wedding websites, attend bridal shows to familiarize yourself with latest designer trends. Keep pictures of the designs you like. From the type, size and location of your reception, determine your budget and styles of wedding gowns you prefer. Contact friends and/or relatives for recommended bridal shops in your area.

Selection: Start shopping as soon as you set your date. Most designer wedding dresses need to be special ordered. It could take 3 to 6 months for special order or designer wedding dresses to arrive. Order at least six months prior to your reception. This will allow time for fittings, alteration, and consultation. If you decided to have your gown custom made, allow about 6 months since selection of style, fabric and details along with fittings takes time.

[...]

Offending website copying our content
Wedding Dress Shopping Tips
http://www.info4wedding.com/weddingdress_shoppingtips.htm

Research: Look through bridal magazines and wedding websites, attend bridal shows to familiarize yourself with latest designer trends. Keep pictures of the designs you like. From the type, size and location of your reception, determine your budget and styles of wedding gowns you prefer. Contact friends and/or relatives for recommended bridal shops in your area.

 Selection: Start shopping as soon as you set your date. Most designer wedding dresses need to be special ordered. It could take 3 to 6 months for special order or designer wedding dresses to arrive. Order at least six months prior to your reception. This will allow time for fittings, alteration, and consultation. If you decided to have your gown custom made, allow about 6 months since selection of style, fabric and details along with fittings takes time.
